page.title: 09FISHBOURNE PLAYING FIELD
page.content: Fishbourne Playing Field is owned by the public.My Dad(John Fraser)runs the Playing Field Association at the moment.At the Playing fields is a tennis court,bowling green,cricket square and three football pitches.The playing fields has entertainment,like the summer ball,fetes and the main event in Fishbourne is Fishbourne Fireworks.There is three huts,the huts are used for toliets,first aid and the cricket club.The second hut is used for the bowling green.The third hut is used for the tractor which cuts the grass.The person who drives the tractor is Cyril Turner.The playing fields has just got some new playing aparatus.
